unnormalised: Due to the ongoing monsoon season, several trains on the Central Railway line faced delays today. The 12109 Mumbai-Manmad Panchavati Express, scheduled to arrive in Manmad at 13:15 hrs, was delayed by approx. 2 hrs. Railway officials cited waterlogging on the tracks near Igatpuri as the primary cause.
normalised: Due to the ongoing monsoon season, several trains on the Central Railway line faced delays today. The one two one zero nine Mumbai-Manmad Panchavati Express, scheduled to arrive in Manmad at one thirty fifteen hours, was delayed by approximately two hours. Railway officials cited waterlogging on the tracks near Igatpuri as the primary cause.

unnormalised: Furthermore, the 11057 Mumbai-Amritsar Express, normally departing at 23:30 hrs, was rescheduled to leave at 01:00 hrs on 16/07/2024. Passengers are advised to check the NTES app for real-time updates. A helpline number, 139, has been activated to assist commuters with inquiries.
normalised: Furthermore, the one one zero five seven Mumbai-Amritsar Express, normally departing at twenty three thirty hours, was rescheduled to leave at zero one hundred hours on sixteenth july two thousand and twenty four. Passengers are advised to check the N-T-E-S app for real-time updates. A helpline number, one thirty nine, has been activated to assist commuters with inquiries.

unnormalised: Additionally, several local train services were running 15-20 mins behind schedule during the morning peak hours. Western Railway also reported minor disruptions, with the Virar-Churchgate fast local expected to reach Churchgate at 09:45 am arriving closer to 10:05 am. Authorities are working to restore normalcy as soon as possible.
normalised: Additionally, several local train services were running fifteen to twenty minutes behind schedule during the morning peak hours. Western Railway also reported minor disruptions, with the Virar-Churchgate fast local expected to reach Churchgate at zero nine forty five A-M arriving closer to ten zero five A-M. Authorities are working to restore normalcy as soon as possible.
